Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Tom and Jerry'?
Questions.Explanation: Tom is the mischievous cat who is always trying to catch Jerry the mouse.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a group of crime-fighting turtles?
Questions.Explanation: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles follows the adventures of four turtles trained in martial arts.

Questions.Question: Who is the main antagonist in 'The Powerpuff Girls'?
Questions.Explanation: Mojo Jojo is a super-intelligent monkey and the arch-nemesis of the Powerpuff Girls.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the dog in 'The Jetsons'?
Questions.Explanation: Astro is the loyal pet dog of the Jetson family in the futuristic world of 'The Jetsons'.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a cat and a mouse as the main characters?
Questions.Explanation: Tom and Jerry is a timeless cartoon series that revolves around the comedic rivalry between a cat and a mouse.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in 'The Flintstones'?
Questions.Explanation: Fred Flintstone is the bumbling but lovable protagonist of 'The Flintstones', a prehistoric animated sitcom.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Scooby-Doo'?
Questions.Explanation: Scooby-Doo is a talking Great Dane and the star of the mystery-solving gang in the animated series.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a family living in the Stone Age?
Questions.Explanation: The Flintstones is a classic animated sitcom that depicts the daily life of a Stone Age family.

Questions.Question: Who is the leader of the Autobots in 'Transformers'?
Questions.Explanation: Optimus Prime is the noble and courageous leader of the Autobots, the heroic robots in 'Transformers'.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Popeye the Sailor'?
Questions.Explanation: Popeye is a spinach-loving sailor with superhuman strength who always comes to the rescue.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a group of friends solving mysteries with a talking dog?
Questions.Explanation: Scooby-Doo and his friends travel in the Mystery Machine, solving supernatural mysteries.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in 'Looney Tunes'?
Questions.Explanation: Bugs Bunny is the iconic and mischievous rabbit known for his catchphrase 'What's up, Doc?'

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'The Simpsons'?
Questions.Explanation: Homer Simpson is the bumbling but lovable father in the long-running animated sitcom 'The Simpsons'.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a futuristic family living in space?
Questions.Explanation: The Jetsons is a classic animated sitcom set in a futuristic world with flying cars and advanced technology.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in 'He-Man and the Masters of the Universe'?
Questions.Explanation: He-Man is the alter ego of Prince Adam and the most powerful man in the universe.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'The Powerpuff Girls'?
Questions.Explanation: Blossom is the intelligent and confident leader of the Powerpuff Girls, known for her pink color.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a group of superhero children with unique powers?
Questions.Explanation: The Powerpuff Girls are three super-powered sisters who protect the city of Townsville from villains.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in 'Inspector Gadget'?
Questions.Explanation: Inspector Gadget is a bumbling detective with various gadgets built into his body to fight crime.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'The Smurfs'?
Questions.Explanation: Papa Smurf is the wise and caring leader of the Smurfs, a community of small blue creatures.

Questions.Question: Which classic animated series features a group of mutant turtles named after famous artists?
Questions.Explanation: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are named after Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael.
